entry.title: Speedy Trial
entry.summary: The context provided includes a link to a python script, which is said to be capable of attacking Bitcoin through the use of `invalidateblock` RPC. However, this statement is followed by a clarification that it was just a joke and the script can actually be helpful. The entire code is available on GitHub and it has been written in about 40 lines of python. The context ends with a question about parallel lines meeting at infinity.
